Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the skill and Alexa, you can now control your tv with just your voice. change channels, pause/play/fast forward/rewind. 
Examples to try:
Alexa, discover smart home devices
Alexa, fast forward on tv 
Alexa, next on tv
Alexa, pause on tv
Alexa, play on tv
Alexa, resume on tv
Alexa, go back on tv
Alexa, rewind on tv 
Alexa, start over on tv
Alexa, stop tv
Alexa, change channel to five on tv
Alexa, change channel to PBS on tv
Alexa, channel up on tv
Alexa, channel down on tv
Alexa, switch input to HDMI1 on tv
Alexa, turn on tv
Alexa, turn off tv
Alexa, turn the volume up on tv by 20
Alexa, turn the volume down on tv by 10
Alexa, mute tv
Alexa, unmute tv

STARTING
1.login you account on tv and name your tv
2.open alexa app to enable、link accounts and discovery you devices.
3.complete setup.

NOTE 
1.you can login your account on all your tv, it can multi-tv support.
2.set unique name for you each tv,otherwise will make mistake.
3.try discovery device after rename tv.
4.on music model,the fast-forward/rewind command only advances/rewinds in 5 second increments.;on movie model,keep fast forward/rewind until receive "play" command
